thread.title: Jennifer Aniston 'still in honeymoon phase'

title: Jennifer Aniston 'still in honeymoon phase'
text:
Jennifer Aniston 'still in honeymoon phase' Jennifer Aniston 'still in honeymoon phase' 
Jennifer Aniston and Justin Theroux are ''still in the honeymoon phase''. 
The couple tied the knot two months ago in a secret ceremony at their Los Angeles home and could not be happier. 
A source told PEOPLE: ''Jen and Justin are very happy. They still act like they are in the honeymoon phase.'' 
Justin previously admitted that he finds being apart from Jennifer ''horrible''. 
The 44-year-old actor and screenwriter has been working in Texas for new movie 'Zoolander 2' and admitted he doesn't enjoy being away from the 'Cake' actress but they ''work'' around it. 
Justin shared: ''It's horrible being apart from your spouse. She's been here a bunch of times and visited, I sneak back when I can go see her - we make it work. 
''We FaceTime, we call and text but when you're on set, the hours are so long, so you're really waiting for the weekend where you can depressurise and have longer conversations.'' 
However even with thousands of miles between them, the handsome actor is just happy to be finally married to the 46-year-old actress after a three-year engagement. 
Shortly after they tied the knot, Justin revealed: ''It's fantastic. Something really does shift in a wonderful way and it refocuses things and in a weird way, it was a long time coming.'' Contactmusic
